mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no, p.user_id, u.nickname, IFNULL(uf.no, 0) as profileImgNo, p.content, f.no as file_no, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_code, IFNULL(l.likeCount, 0) as likeCount, IFNULL(w.wishCount, 0) as wishCount FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN file f ON p.post_no = f.parent_no AND f.parent_table = 'post' AND f.file_code = 1 LEFT JOIN file uf ON u.no = uf.parent_no AND uf.parent_table = 'user' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_no, COUNT(*) as likeCount FROM `like` GROUP BY post_no ) l ON p.post_no = l.post_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT parent_no, COUNT(*) as wishCount FROM wishlist WHERE parent_table = 'post' GROUP BY parent_no ) w ON p.post_no = w.parent_no ORDER BY p.created_at DESC;

SELECT p.post_no, p.user_id, u.nickname, COALESCE(f.no, 0) AS profileImgNo, p.content, COALESCE(l.likeCount, 0) AS likeCount, COALESCE(w.wishCount, 0) AS wishCount, t.p_no AS product_no FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT parent_no, no FROM file WHERE parent_table = 'user' ) f ON u.no = f.parent_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_no, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM `like` GROUP BY post_no ) l ON p.post_no = l.post_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT parent_no, COUNT(*) AS wishCount FROM wishlist WHERE parent_table = 'post' GROUP BY parent_no ) w ON p.post_no = w.parent_no LEFT JOIN tag t ON p.post_no = t.post_no WHERE p.post_no = #{postno};

SELECT p.post_no as post_no , p.user_id as user_id , p.content as contetnt , f.no as file_no , f.file_name as file_name , f.file_path as file_path , f.file_code as file_code , IFNULL((SELECT count(*) from `like` l where l.post_no = p.post_no),0) as likeCount , IFNULL((SELECT count(*) from wishlist w where w.parent_no = p.post_no and w.parent_table = 'post'),0) as wishCount FROM post p INNER JOIN file f on post_no = parent_no and f.parent_table='post' and user_id = #{userId} and file_code = 1
SELECT max(post_no) as maxNo FROM post

SELECT p.post_no as post_no , p.user_id as user_id , u.nickname as nickname , ifNull((select no from file f where u.no = f.parent_no and parent_table = "user"),0) as profileImgNo , p.content as contetnt , f.no as file_no , f.file_name as file_name , f.file_path as file_path , f.file_code as file_code , IFNULL((SELECT count(*) from `like` l where l.post_no = p.post_no),0) as likeCount , IFNULL((SELECT count(*) from wishlist w where w.parent_no = p.post_no and w.parent_table = 'post'),0) as wishCount FROM post p INNER JOIN file f on post_no = parent_no and f.parent_table='post' and file_code = 1 INNER JOIN user u on p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT p.post_no as post_no , p.user_id as user_id , u.nickname as nickname , ifNull((select no from file f where u.no = f.parent_no and parent_table = "user"),0) as profileImgNo , p.content as content , f.no as file_no , f.file_name as file_name , f.file_path as file_path , f.file_code as file_code , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) from `like` l where l.post_no = p.post_no),0) as likeCount , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) from wishlist w where w.parent_no = p.post_no and w.parent_table = 'post'),0) as wishCount , t.p_no FROM post p INNER JOIN file f on post_no = parent_no and f.parent_table='post' and file_code = 1 INNER JOIN user u on p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t on p.post_no = t.post_no where t.p_no = #{pNo} order by likeCount DESC, p.created_at DESC limit 4;
